Name: Luminous Angel
Story Background: The Luminous Angel is a celestial being of radiant beauty and unwavering compassion. Its presence brings hope and healing to those in need, its luminous wings symbolizing the enduring light of grace and benevolence.
Ability: Flying, Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.), At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have at least 20 or more life, gain +1/+1
Appearance Description: The Luminous Angel is a resplendent figure with opalescent wings that shimmer with ethereal radiance. Its serene countenance emanates a soothing warmth that envelops all in its vicinity, and its eyes exude an otherworldly serenity that inspires awe and reverence.
